name: Secret Agent: Istanbul - Secret Documents
description:
Our team consisting of gamers, life coach and content writers have just prepared a real role playing adventure and puzzle game for you! Are you ready to be a secret agent!

"Secret Agent: Istanbul" game is the first and the only interactive video puzzle / room escape game. You will be a secret agent and your mission is penetrating into a secret office and getting the top secret documents. You will find yourself in a conspiracy to escape and you need to find the clues and solve the puzzles to finish your tasks.

Secret Agent: Istanbul game is also gives you a chance to see Istanbul’s historical places. Be ready to see old places and feel the history! Download now and have fun.

Supported Languages: English, Turkish, French, Chinese
